duties.name: Design and implementation of a front-end application for handling bus chargers.It handles visualisation (charts, map), validation and editing substantial amounts of data. Custom app mode for displaying on chargers, adapted to operate in difficult lighting and weather conditions (build in screen keyboard, more accessible user interface).

duties.details: React / Redux-Toolkit / ActionCable / Ruby on Rails / devise /  React Native
duties.name: Design and implementation of the prototype of the fullstack application for handling ozonators (room disinfection device) in hotels/others, in cooperation with the hardware team. A customized API and front-end application for visualizing and controlling devices were created. A prototype of a mobile application cooperating with the device was also created.
Design and implementation of a front-end application for handling editing custom configuration files stored in GitLab, ensuring the correctness of the data and access to the history of editing.
Design and implementation of a front-end application for creating end editing svg visualisations with custom elements.
